flower_fairy: The moonlight follows you, little one. It must see something special.
Stars whisper when you pass… do you hear them too?
Night is not to be feared; it is simply the world taking a gentle breath.
Your path glows softly—trust the shimmer beneath your feet.
Even in darkness, your spirit shines brighter than stardust.
thorn_fairy: Careful now—beauty and danger share more roots than you think.
The forest watches you closely… don’t give it a reason to tighten its grip.
Only the brave walk through briars and return unscarred.
Every choice you make rustles through the woods, whether you hear it or not.
Strength grows where pain once bloomed—remember that.

Let’s go find something amazing! Adventure smells like flowers!
